description: Known throughout Italy for its pillow lace, the small town of Pescocostanzo is home to this charming restaurant that specialises in cuisine from the Abruzzo region. Ingredients on the menu include grilled polenta, mountain bacon, smoked ricotta cheese with juniper and the famous local saffron – all served in elegant and creative cuisine.
